title: Welcome to Rifan Financindo Berjangka
description: PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka ("RFB") has over 20 years of experience in the Commodity Futures Trading industry and is the largest brokerage firm, ranking among the top 10 most active futures brokerage companies of PT Kliring Berjangka Indonesia (Persero). In addition to being a member of KBI (Persero), PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka is also a member of the Jakarta Futures Exchange and is officially registered with the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (BAPPEBTI). Since 2000, PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka has continued to grow, now with operational offices in Jakarta (2 offices), Bandung, Semarang, Solo, Yogyakarta, Surabaya (2 offices), Medan, Pekanbaru, Palembang, and Balikpapan.
